about_the_game:
Demo Version of the game Level Unknown: Backrooms. Embark on a terrifying journey into the unknown with the game "Level Unknown: Backrooms," a horror puzzle set in the Backrooms space. Test your logical thinking skills and nerves in both single-player adventure and multiplayer cooperation mode.

Immersive Horror-Puzzle Gameplay

Dive deep into the disturbing depths of terror, traversing ominous corridors and mysterious rooms in the Backrooms. Solve puzzles, confront supernatural entities, and uncover the dark secrets that await. The horror built on the best horror film conventions is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Backrooms Lore

The game faithfully reproduces the lore of the Backrooms, capturing key motifs and the atmosphere of this mysterious world. Precise detailing allows players to immerse themselves in this enigmatic universe. With careful lore reproduction, the game offers a unique experience, transporting players into a surreal space full of mysteries.

Photorealistic 3D Environment

Experience a visually stunning and realistic world, carefully crafted to immerse you in the nightmarish atmosphere of the Backrooms. Every shadow, creak, and flicker of light contributes to the intensity of the experience.

Single-Player Game

Prepare for a solitary journey into the abyss. The single-player mode offers an engaging narrative that unfolds as you explore the dark Backrooms, with each step increasing tension and horror.

Multiplayer Cooperation Mode

Join forces with friends to face the Backrooms together. Communication and cooperation are key as you work as a group. Co-op for up to 4 players takes the events from the single-player gameplay to an entirely different level.

Uncover Secrets

The Backrooms conceal secrets that go beyond understanding. Connect the story fragments as you progress, uncovering the truth behind the events and learning the fate of those who ventured into this nightmarish dimension before.

Immersive Interactions with Realistic Object Physics

Experience unique realism through our object physics system. Feel the weight of each item as you manipulate the environment; this is just one feature that adds depth and authenticity during the exploration of the unsettling Backrooms.

Collaboration with Wojtek Gola

As a co-creator and publisher, as well as one of the most influential names in the Polish influencer scene, Wojtek Gola played a crucial role in the success of the Fame MMA event. Now, he invites you to experience something completely new. Gather your team and face the nightmares of the Backrooms together with friends in our first collaborative game.
